name: housing-maintenance-code-violations
title: Housing Maintenance Code Violations
keywords: department of housing preservation and development
description: PLEASE NOTE: For a complete list of open violations, review the “all open violations” file available on HPD’s website. Pursuant to New York City’s Housing Maintenance Code, the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD) issues violations against conditions in rental dwelling units that have been verified to violate the New York City using Maintenance Code (HMC) or the New York State Multiple Dwelling Law (MDL). Violations are issued when an inspection verifies that a violation of the HMC or MDL exists. It is closed when the violation is corrected, as observed/verified by HPD or as certified by the landlord.

sources.title: Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD)
